title: The role of pattern-recognition receptors in innate immunity: update on Toll-like receptors
author: Kawai, Taro and Akira, Shizuo
abstract: The discovery of Toll-like receptors (TLRs) as components that recognize conserved structures in pathogens has greatly advanced understanding of how the body senses pathogen invasion. triggers innate immune responses and primes antigen-specific adaptive
